original_text: She recognized Peter's voice and she was very happy. But she did not open the door. Instead, she ran back into the house and she said to all the people there, ‘Peter is standing outside the door!’
korean_text: 베드로의 음성인 줄 알고 기뻐하여 문을 미처 열지 못하고 달려 들어가 말하되 베드로가 대문 밖에 섰더라 하니

sentences.original_text: But she did not open the door
Instead, she ran back into the house
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 그녀는 집 안으로 달려 돌아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and she said to all the people there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거기에 있는 모든 사람들에게 말했습니다
